column2:
"Oh hey, <%me>!
It's me! I don't actually remember what I'm doing here, though...
Or much else."
"If I had to guess... I'd say we're Phantoms embodying someone's feelings, like happened before."
"There must be some reason why we three were embodied. Some desire or mission that we need to fulfill..."

"...I guess there is something I want to do. I don't know if I'd call it a mission, though...
I hate to ask, but maybe you could help me with that?"
"Still... Why am I wearing a swimsuit?! Everyone's staring at me!"
"When I woke up here, I was pretty surprised to see I was in a swimsuit. I've gotten used to it now, though."
"The hot sun feels really good. I wish Kohri and Aru were here too."
"Summer in Tokyo is nice, but it's not too bad here either."
"It feels like the tropical atmosphere could heal the wounds in anyone's heart."

"Sorry for taking up your time...
And thanks for helping us out."
"It's hot out, so make sure you stay hydrated and don't overwork yourself."
"The chewy texture from the tapioca in that drink is addictive, huh?"
"There's way more delicious food like that in Tokyo. You should come visit us more often."
